sentences.chinese: 六。勃為相，潁陰侯灌嬰為太尉。
sentences.literal: Six. Bo as chancellor, Yingyin Marquis Guan Ying as Grand Commandant.

sentences.chinese: 除誹謗律。皇子武為代王，參為太原王，揖為梁王。十月，丞相平薨。
sentences.literal: Abolished slander law. Imperial son Wu as Dai King, Shen as Taiyuan King, Yi as Liang King. Tenth month, Chancellor Ping passed away.

sentences.chinese: 一。十一月乙亥，絳侯勃復為丞相。
sentences.literal: One. Eleventh month yi hai, Jiang Marquis Bo again as Chancellor.

sentences.chinese: 徙代王武為淮陽王。上幸太原。濟北王反。匈奴大入上郡。以地盡與太原，太原更號代。十一月壬子，勃免相，之國。
sentences.literal: Moved Dai King Wu to Huaiyang King. Emperor visited Taiyuan. Jibei King rebelled. Xiongnu greatly entered Shangjun. With territory all given to Taiyuan, Taiyuan changed name to Dai. Eleventh month renzi, Bo dismissed from chancellor, went to his fief.

sentences.chinese: 一。十二月乙亥，太尉潁陰侯灌嬰為丞相。罷太尉官。
sentences.literal: One. Twelfth month yi hai, Grand Commandant Yingyin Marquis Guan Ying as Chancellor. Abolished Grand Commandant office.

sentences.chinese: 二。棘蒲侯陳武為大將軍，擊濟北。昌侯盧卿、共侯盧罷師、甯侯鸱、深澤侯將夜皆為將軍，屬武祁侯賀，將兵屯滎陽。
sentences.literal: Two. Jipu Marquis Chen Wu as Grand General, attacked Jibei. Chang Marquis Lu Qing, Gong Marquis Lu Bashi, Ning Marquis Chi, Shenze Marquis Jiang Ye all as generals, subordinate to Wuqi Marquis He, led troops stationed at Xingyang.
Twelfth month jisi, Ying passed away.

sentences.chinese: 一。正月甲午，御史大夫北平侯張蒼為丞相。
sentences.literal: One. First month jiawu, Imperial Secretary Beiping Marquis Zhang Cang as Chancellor.
